Codes¶

MC event generator¶

class theory.mceg.MCEG(wdir, tabname, iset, iF2, iFL, iF3, sign, rs, fname, veto, **kargs)¶
Parameters:
  • wdir – directory to store the results
  • tabname – The lhapdf table name see LHAPDF grids
  • iset – The table set
  • iF2 – flavor index for F2
  • iFL – flavor index for FL
  • iF3 – flavor index for F3
  • sign – 1 for electron 1 for positron
  • rs – center of mass energy
  • fname – file name for the generator
  • veto – user defined cuts
buil_mceg()¶

build the vegas integrator as MCEG

gen_events(nevents)¶

Generate events

Parameters:nevents – number of desired events
Returns:dictionary with arrays for X,Y,Q2,W. it also includes root s used to generate the mceg in case is needed for cross checks
get_ntot(lum)¶
Parameters:lum – str e.g. ‘10:fb-1’
Returns:total number of events for a given of the current generator and input luminosity

DIS cross section calculator¶

class theory.idis.IDIS(tabname, iset, iF2, iFL, iF3, sign, veto)¶
Parameters:
  • tabname – The lhapdf table name see LHAPDF grids
  • iset – The table set
  • iF2 – flavor index for F2
  • iFL – flavor index for FL
  • iF3 – flavor index for F3
  • sign – 1 for electron 1 for positron
  • veto – user defined cuts
get_cross_section(neval, rs, mode, iw, xmin=None, xmax=None, ymin=None, ymax=None, Q2min=None, Q2max=None, units=None, **kargs)¶

Compute integrated DIS cross section

Parameters:
  • neval – number of vegas integration samples
  • rs – center of mass energy
  • mode – ‘xy’ or ‘xQ2’
  • iw – 0:cross section 1,2: weighted cross section
  • xmin – minimum x
  • xmax – maximum x
  • ymin – minimum y
  • ymax – maximum y
  • Q2min – minimum Q2
  • Q2max – maximum Q2
get_sigma_dxdQ2(x, Q2, iw)¶

Compute differential cross section

Parameters:
  • x – x bjorken
  • Q2 – Q2
  • iw – 0:cross section 1,2: weighted cross section
get_sigma_dxdy(x, y, iw)¶

Compute differential cross section

Parameters:
  • x – x bjorken
  • y – y
  • iw – 0:cross section 1,2: weighted cross section
